body_html:
I think this is a good start, thank you!

However, some of the things apply only to the first time, so you may want to separate it out, because after your first time the CLA will be on file, etc, etc.. If you think about the usability of a PR comment, it's a bad idea to put the description and details right at the bottom, because it will take more time for others to be able to read it.

I suggest instead of a new file, you suggest this checklist in a section at the top of CONTRIBUTING.md, where it will act as a kind of table of contents/TL;DR for that file. Once people have been through it a few times, it won't be necessary, and I am loathe to add the extra noise to PR descriptions.
